title.native: アズールレーン

description:
Azur Lane, a combination of all the different Camps in the world, was once successful in repelling the underwater menace, the Siren. Now splintered, they must face a new threat in Red Axis, former allies who crave to wield this otherworldly Siren technology for their own nefarious desires! Who will be victorious in the never-ending war between these battleship girls!?

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Ships
tags.description: Prominently features the use of sea-based transportation vessels.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

name.native: クイーン・エリザベス
プリンス・オブ・ウェールズ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tensho_tw) | [Website](http://tenshohp.web.fc2.com/)

Representative director of [Bibury](https://anilist.co/studio/6180/). Often teams up with [Masayuki Nonaka](https://anilist.co/staff/116301/).

__[Website](https://kano-official.amebaownd.com/) | [Old Website (Warner Bros)](https://whv-amusic.com/kano/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kano_2525) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCShXNLMXCfstmWKH_q86B8w) | [Nico Nico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/15078610)__


__Introduction:__
Kano is a Japanese vocalist under record label Imperial Records (2018–), having previously been under Warner Bros. Home Entertainment (2015–2018).

__Biography:__
She made her initial debut in 2010, where she would post covers of songs to the video sharing site Nico Nico Douga. A couple of years later in 2012, Kano would make her first original VOCALOID song titled "[Toumei Ningen no Nihilism](https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm16824160)".

It wasn't until 2015, a whole 3 years later, that Kano would release what would be known as her major debut, and which would also become her most popular song to date. Her major debut was the song "[Stella-rium](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNkPJvVEm0s)", which would release through the record label Warner Bros. Home Entertainment as her first single. The song first aired as an opening theme to the TV anime _[Houkago no Pleiades](https://anilist.co/anime/17919/Houkago-no-Pleiades/)_, featuring a shorter TV Size version. The full version of the song released later on May 20, 2015.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tensho_tw) | [Website](http://tenshohp.web.fc2.com/)

Representative director of [Bibury](https://anilist.co/studio/6180/). Often teams up with [Masayuki Nonaka](https://anilist.co/staff/116301/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tensho_tw) | [Website](http://tenshohp.web.fc2.com/)

Representative director of [Bibury](https://anilist.co/studio/6180/). Often teams up with [Masayuki Nonaka](https://anilist.co/staff/116301/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/124182562)

An extremely prolific animator often appearing in dozens of shows yearly.
